com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2MatricesObserverType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    R2MatricesObserverValuesType, R2MatricesValuesType

    public interface R2MatricesObserverType
extends R2MatricesObserverValuesType
    Access to the matrices for a given observer.

        Evaluate matrices for a given transform, relative to the current observer.
        Type Parameters:
        A - The type of consumed values
        B - The type of returned values
        Parameters:
        t - The transform
        uv - The UV matrix
        f - The function that will receive matrices
        x - A context value passed to f
        Returns:
        A value of B
        Throws:
        R2Exception - If f raises R2Exception
